module_restrictions: Students are required to have some basic knowledge or record of course learning for some advanced-level courses.
visa_info: Exchange students in China are required to apply for student visa (X2 visa for those intending to study in China for a period of no more than 180 days and X1 visa for those intending to study in China for a period of more than 180 days).

on_campus.description: ZJU reserve on-campus accommodation for exchange students near the campus where student specialty college/department is located. The cost is approximately RMB1,500 per person per month on twin sharing basis.
on_campus.refundable_deposit: A RMB800 refundable room deposit is required upon checking-in.

cost_of_living: Estimated cost range of S$5,000 to S$15,000 per semester, subject to the country and local conditions at the overseas Partner University during the period of exchange.
university_description: Zhejiang University is located in Hangzhou, China and is considered one of China’s top higher education institutions. The university consists of 7 faculties which include 36 schools with various specializations.
university_address: 38 Zheda Rd, Xihu District, Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China, 310027
location_cost_of_living: Living expenses in Hangzhou can be considered affordable compared to other major cities in China. Housing is a major expense, but other expenses such as food, transportation and entertainment are much more affordable.
location_weather: Hangzhou has a subtropical monsoon humid climate. It has four distinct seasons, with a rainy season in early summer. Winters are cool and dry while summers are long, very hot and humid.
location_description: Hangzhou is a city located in the eastern part of China. It is a popular tourist destination known for its scenic beauty, West Lake, Silk production as well as being one of China’s major technology hubs.
location_crime: Hangzhou is considered to be a safe city with a low crime rate.
location_transportation: The Hangzhou Metro railways and public bus systems are the main modes of public transportation, with buses being affordable and metro systems being efficient and cost-effective.
location_halal: Halal food options are available in Hangzhou. It is important for students to inform the dining hall staff or the restaurant staff if they have any dietary restrictions.
location_vegetarian: Vegetarian food options are available in Hangzhou. It is important for students to inform the dining hall staff or the restaurant staff if they have any dietary restrictions.
